In homage of Alain DaniÃ©lou, founder of the Collection, UNESCO re-issues the anthology of classical music of India, which was the first of Indian music to become available in the West. 

It includes the first recording made in Europe of Ravi Shankar and Ali Akbar Khan.
Recorded in 1950 â€“ 1955
